title: can't install gotour locally, because of not existing hg command
body:
by **Dmitrij.Jerschow**: 
OS=WIndowsXP SP3
Current Go Version = go1 
installation package = go.go1.windows-386.msi
install folder = c:\go 
environment:
PATH=c:\go
GOROOT=C:\GO
 
PROBLEM:
========

When trying to install gotour locally, the following error is appeared

C:\GO\bin>go get code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour
# cd .; hg clone -U https://code.google.com/p/go-tour
C:\GO\src\pkg\code.google.com\p\go-tour
package code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour: exec: "hg": executable file not
found in %PATH%


The search of hg*.* in the c:\go folder, including the sub-folders gave no result.
